DOC.brief_summary: The goal field trial tailor test web-based intervention adult 65 year age old . The purpose study : pilot novel intervention , examine method improve adherence web-based intervention ( e.g. , peer network ) ; collect data feasibility , acceptability , efficacy web-based intervention late life depression ; ultimately , overcome numerous barrier treat depression later life .
DOC.brief_title: Online Peer Networked Collaborative Learning Managing Depressive Symptoms
DOC.criteria: Has elevate depressive symptom Has telephone , email account , computer , broadband access Internet . Has basic internet skill able access internet independently Is able speak read English . Is least 65 year age . Is able give inform consent . Has hearing voice impairment would prevent participation psychotherapy Has visual impairment would prevent completion assessment material . Is diagnose psychotic disorder , bipolar disorder , dissociative disorder , current substance abuse , diagnosis participation clinical trial psychotherapy may either inappropriate dangerous . Is currently receive individual psychotherapy plan receive psychotherapy 8week treatment phase study Is plan town unavailable extended period time study without access Internet Exhibits severe suicidality , include ideation , plan , intent .
